scripts.build:packages: npm run clean:dist && tsc --build tsconfig.packages.build.json && npm run build:mocks
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:dist
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules  && rm -rf apps/main/node_modules && rm -rf apps/admin/node_modules
scripts.clean:dist: rm -rf dist && rm -rf packages/*/dist && rm -rf mocks/dist
scripts.test: npm run test:main && npm run test:admin && npm run test:shared
scripts.test:packages: npm run build:packages && pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' run test
scripts.test:packages:coverage: npm run build:packages && pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' run test:coverage
scripts.docker:prune: docker system prune -a --volumes && docker builder prune --all
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:packages && npm run lint:apps
